'''Genshin Impact × HEYTEA''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[miHoYo]] and the Chinese tea drink chain {{Lang|{{w|Hey Tea|HEYTEA}}|zh=喜茶}}.

==Collaborations==
To date, there have been '''2''' collaborations between ''Genshin Impact'' and HEYTEA.

===Kamisato Siblings Merchandise===
This collaboration features various HEYTEA drinks and merchandise, with a custom theme centred around [[Kamisato Ayaka]] and [[Kamisato Ayato]].

Other physical merchandise includes:
* HEYTEA-styled Kamisato siblings standee
* HEYTEA Kamisato Ayato styled drinks cup
* HEYTEA Kamisato siblings styled drinks bottles
* HEYTEA special drinks with names and styles representing each of the Kamisato siblings:
** {{Lang|Ayato – Hydro Illusion Longan Coconut Water|zh=绫人・水影龙眼椰|zh_rm=}}
** {{Lang|Ayaka – Frosting Longan Coconut Smoothie|zh=绫华・寒霜龙眼椰|zh_rm=}}

===Joy and Expectation===
{{Lang|Joy and Expectation<!--official-->|zh=心有所喜 约有所期}} features HEYTEA drinks and merchandise themed on [[Ganyu]] and [[Shenhe]].

The special drinks for this collaboration are:
* Ganyu – {{Lang|Qilin Cheese Pudding<!--official-->|zh=甘雨・麟迹仙酪}} 
* Shenhe – {{Lang|Double-Pomelo Adeptal Nectar<!--official-->|zh=申鹤・双柚仙露}}

Physical merchandise is gifted upon purchase, including:
<!--Starting August 11 with the purchase of one collab drink-->
* Custom character-themed drink cup
* Limited [[Cloud Retainer's Damasked Device]]-themed cup sleeve
<!--Starting August 11 with the purchase of two (of the same) collab drinks-->
* Custom character-themed clip stand
* Character-themed fan
* Character-themed paper bag or thermal bag
<!--Starting September 1 with the purchase of a collab set with two (of the same) drinks and two collab desserts-->
* Custom character half-body standee
* Stickers

Additionally, there is an accompanying web event {{Lang|zh=真君的试炼}} which may reward a redemption code which includes:
* Food Item: {{Item|Fruity Smoothie|x=2}}
* Food Item: {{Item|Fruity Duet|x=2}}
* Limited Collaboration Furnishing: {{Item|Cheese and Dew Teatime|x=1}}
* {{Item|Primogem|x=40}}
